articles.title: Rwanda Marburg outbreak: Africa health chief criticises US travel advice - BBC.com
articles.description: Rwandan officials say the country's outbreak of the deadly Marburg virus is under control.
articles.content:
Most of those who have died from the Marburg virus in Rwanda have been healthcare workers 
US official advice against non-essential travel to Rwanda in light of the outbreak of the deadly Marburg vi… [+4980 chars]
